sentences.en: a new text book was in course of preparation.
sentences.cn: 新的课本正在准备之中。

sentences.en: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.cn: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.en: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.cn: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.en: each man would, in the course of nature, have his private opinions.
sentences.cn: 每个人通常都有自己的观点。

sentences.en: he battled to keep the ship on course.
sentences.cn: 他拼命不让船偏离航道。

sentences.en: he was a friend to many people in the course of his life.
sentences.cn: 他一生中帮助过许多人。

sentences.en: He was charged with conspiring to pervert the course of justice.
sentences.cn: 他被控谋划妨碍司法公正。

sentences.en: His course at Sheffield University will not recommence until next year.
sentences.cn: 他在谢菲尔德大学的课程要到明年才能继续。

sentences.en: his illness had to run its course to the crisis.
sentences.cn: 他的病情势必每况愈下，越来越严重。

sentences.en: His smile sent waves of excitement coursing through her.
sentences.cn: 他的微笑让她感到一股兴奋的暖流涌遍全身。

sentences.en: However, the rationale for such in-itiatives is not, of course, solely economic.
sentences.cn: 然而，这种提议的根据当然并不仅仅是经济方面的。

sentences.en: In the course of the argument, the most enormous errors of fact simply pullulated.
sentences.cn: 在争论过程中，最厉害的事实谬误简直有增无减。

sentences.en: In the course of time, many of their myths become entangled.
sentences.cn: 最后，他们很多荒诞的说法都变得错综复杂了。

sentences.en: It would be most unwise to minimize the dangers of this course of action.
sentences.cn: 不认真对待这次行动过程中的危险是极不明智的。

sentences.en: Of course I'm not. It was just a figure of speech.
sentences.cn: 我当然不是，这不过是打个比方。

sentences.en: Of course, not all alcoholics and drug abusers produce deviant offspring.
sentences.cn: 当然，并不是所有的酗酒者和吸毒者都会生育出不正常的后代。

sentences.en: Of course, now she is away at boarding school.
sentences.cn: 当然，她现在住在寄宿学校那边。

sentences.en: Of course, slap-bang in the middle of town the rents are high.
sentences.cn: 当然啦，市区正中心的租金是很高的。

sentences.en: Of course, the British will suffer such daily stresses patiently.
sentences.cn: 当然，英国人将会耐心地承受这些日常压力。

sentences.en: Of course, there'squite obviously a lot of synergy between the two companies.
sentences.cn: 当然，这两家公司间非常明显地产生了巨大的协同效应。

sentences.en: She is currently doing a business studies course at Leeds.
sentences.cn: 她目前在利兹大学修读一门商科课程。

sentences.en: She'd half expected him to withdraw from the course.
sentences.cn: 她多少已经预料到他会中途就退出这门课程。

sentences.en: the car went careering off course.
sentences.cn: 汽车偏离道路疾驰。

sentences.en: The course is designed to help students with colour and composition.
sentences.cn: 设置这门课程是为了指导学生如何运用色彩和构图。

sentences.en: The course should be history,but history, philosophized,is a history of ideas as well as of events.
sentences.cn: 过程应该就是历史，不过哲学化的历史，就是又有观念又有事件的历史。

sentences.en: The two communities are now on a collision course.
sentences.cn: 这两个社区之间现在有可能会发生冲突。

sentences.en: To ascribe opinions retrospectively is of course very dangerous.
sentences.cn: 事后再翻出当初谁说了什么当然是很危险的。

sentences.en: to get back on course, I relied on one of my stock questions.
sentences.cn: 我借着一个老套的问题回到了正题。

sentences.en: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.cn: 我们的主菜是鱼。

sentences.en: You must pass the examination to get credit for the course.
sentences.cn: 你必须通过考试才能获得那门课程的学分。

words.tran_cn: 追赶；奔驰；携带猎犬狩猎
跑过；追逐；指引航线（course的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 基础课，基础课程；基本训练
学科；学习的进程；研究课程
学完正式课程并经过考试；按照一定顺序
自然而然地发展；按常规进行
培训班；训练课程；实习课

trans.tran_cn: 课程，讲座，航向，方针，行为方式，进程，疗程，一道菜，高尔夫球，比赛场地，泳道，江河流向，河道，层
trans.tran_en: a period of time or process during which something happens
if a feeling courses through you, you feel it suddenly and strongly
